columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the rule group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entity.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the rule group.

columns.name: scope
columns.description: Specifies the scope of the rule group. Possible values are: 'REGIONAL' and 'CLOUDFRONT'.

columns.name: capacity
columns.description: The web ACL capacity units (WCUs) required for this rule group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the rule group that helps with identification.

columns.name: lock_token
columns.description: A token used for optimistic locking.

columns.name: rules
columns.description: The Rule statements used to identify the web requests that you want to allow, block, or count.

columns.name: visibility_config
columns.description: Defines and enables Amazon CloudWatch metrics and web request sample collection.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the resource.

columns.name: partition
columns.description: The AWS partition in which the resource is located (aws, aws-cn, or aws-us-gov).

columns.name: region
columns.description: The AWS Region in which the resource is located.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The AWS Account ID in which the resource is located.
